products.title: Our Products
products.desc: Discover our professional solutions for web, automation, and digital transformation. Each product is developed by experts and legally reviewed.
product.starter.title: Starter Website
product.starter.text: The ideal solution for founders, freelancers, and small businesses: A modern, responsive website with up to 5 pages, optimized for SEO and privacy. Includes contact form, basic analytics, and 1 year hosting. Legally reviewed and GDPR-compliant.
product.pro.title: Pro Business Suite
product.pro.text: For growing businesses: Custom design, animations, automated workflows, blog, portfolio, and multilingual support. Performance optimization, advanced SEO, and integration of third-party services. All content and processes are legally and technically reviewed.
product.enterprise.title: Enterprise Platform
product.enterprise.text: For demanding digital projects: Development of custom web apps, interfaces, and API integration. Scalable cloud infrastructure, automation, personal project management, and highest security standards. All solutions are auditable and legally secured.
